item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, January 25, 2025 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Open Heart Protocol (75 points | 18 comments)
2. Show HN: I built a DIY plane spotting system at home (96 points | 26 comments)
3. A FPGA friendly 32 bit RISC-V CPU implementation (16 points | 1 comment)
4. I got OpenAI o1 to play the boardgame Codenames and it's super good (133 points | 71 comments)
5. Pixelfed Hit 500K Users (172 points | 36 comments)
6. Show HN: Krita RGBA Tech – Exploring Filter Engines in Open-Source Art (16 points | 1 comment)
7. The Mythical IO-Bound Rails App (118 points | 23 comments)
8. How to build your own ZX80/ZX81 (2019) (56 points | 14 comments)
9. An overview of gradient descent optimization algorithms (2016) (93 points | 16 comments)
10. Life lessons from the first half-century of my career (280 points | 91 comments)
11. Arsenal FC AI Research Engineer Job Posting (72 points | 58 comments)
12. How far can you get in 40 minutes from each subway station in NYC? (152 points | 93 comments)
13. Show HN: Cs16.css – CSS library based on Counter Strike 1.6 UI (740 points | 121 comments)
14. Hacker infects 18,000 "script kiddies" with fake malware builder (112 points | 49 comments)
15. Ask HN: Moving a not-for-profit web app off AWS (23 points | 35 comments)
16. IEEE Credentialing Program (12 points | discuss)
17. Inboxbooster (YC W17) Is Hiring ( | hide)
18. Doorbell camera catches rare footage of meteorite striking home's front walkway (62 points | 35 comments)
19. Show HN: Trolling SMS spammers with Ollama (265 points | 100 comments)
20. File Explorer is merged to Helix editor (210 points | 27 comments)
21. TinyZero (167 points | 24 comments)
22. Show HN: Using YOLO to Detect Office Chairs in 40M Hotel Photos (189 points | 103 comments)
23. Show HN: Habby – A straightforward bullet journal with habit tracking (39 points | 12 comments)
24. Show HN: Lightpanda, an open-source headless browser in Zig (272 points | 128 comments)
25. Wild – A fast linker for Linux (355 points | 174 comments)
26. State Department issues immediate, widespread pause on foreign aid (18 points | 1 comment)
27. Advent of Code 2024 and BQN (45 points | 5 comments)
28. Why North England is poor (17 points | 6 comments)
29. A phishing attack involving g.co, Google's URL shortener (338 points | 138 comments)
30. Snowdrop OS – a homebrew operating system from scratch, in assembly language (279 points | 61 comments)
